title: Understanding Semiconductor Exhaust System Particle Accumulation Monitoring Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Engineering Knowledge and Understanding of Semiconductor Manufacturing Processes
context.additional_context: Learners experience a real semiconductor manufacturing environment through VR simulation, understanding ultrasound sensors and machine learning-based monitoring systems. Practical sessions are conducted on personal devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the causes and impacts of powder accumulation in semiconductor exhaust systems.
Learners can understand and apply the principles of powder thickness measurement using ultrasonic sensors and machine learning.
Learners can analyze monitoring system data in a simulated environment and propose preventive maintenance strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
